when installing it, it installs up to 50% then ask for disk 2, i tried all the folders and none worked. which one is "disk 2"?

@jamie8520:
There are three .iso files included with the torrent.
They are numbered 1-3.
These are discs 1-3.
Mount the first one, start the install.
When it asks for the second, unmount the first image and mount the second.
Do the same for the third disc.
If you need any more explanation than that, you'll have to hope someone with more patience comes along.
These are absolute basics.
